title: The Curious Couple
medium: collage, cloth and glass on canvas
provenance_text:
Enrico Baj [1924-2003], Milan, Italy [1]; Gallery One, London, England, until November 1958 [2]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1958 [3].

Notes:
[1]. The collage was exhibited (no. 29, illustrated in catalogue, plate 37) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. See Department of Fine Arts Committee minutes, November 21, 1958.
[3]. The collage was acquired by Carnegie Institute with the Rosenbloom Purchase Fund (gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles Rosenbloom, Pittsburgh, PA.) It was accessioned on November 21, 1958. The 1958 International catalogue entry lists the work as "Owned by Carnegie Institute."
